- Login is made easier. Your phone number and password.
- Switching interface language without changing phone's language.
- Wallets and Subscriptions are now supported.
- Comments you post are now possible to amend or delete.

- video load optimization.

- Guest-Purchased items are now automatically kept under Library Function under Guest's Menu for easy retrieval.

1. UIWebView replaced by WKWebView
2. “Share” button crash fix
3. Profile “Photo Update” fix
4. in-app purchasing enhanced to guarantee service in case of network fails.
5. “Restore Purchases” for those who missed getting a service after billed for in-app purchases.
6. Arabic text changes in some screens.
